title: Pedro and Vinny's - Food Cart
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Fast food, Mexican, Take-out only, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Previously all veg but no longer since Oct 2012. Small burrito stand that makes everything fresh daily, including the beans and sauces. Conscientious about vegetarians and vegans. Frequented by people who work in the area.
